Alert.AskTimeout: Cannot download data, server timeout ! Do you want to repeat request ?
Alert.AskUploadTimeout: Cannot upload data, server timeout ! Do you want to send data again ?
Alert.ErrHide: You cannot hide all variable columns!
Alert.ErrHideExt: Width of all fixed columns is too wide!
Alert.ErrPrintOpen:
The print window could not be opened
Permit popup windows to let print the grid
Alert.ErrPrint: The document was not successfully printed
Alert.ErrCheck: Synchronizing with server failed! Do you want to temporary disable the checking for updates?
Alert.SearchHelp:
Enter string to search for like in Google
individual keywords separate by space phrases place into double quotes variants separate by uppercase OR keyword exceptions precede by "-" (minus)
Or enter expression to search by
specify columns caption to compare use operators < <= > >= = <> ( ) + - * / use AND OR keywords to join expressions use special keywords STARTS ENDS CONTAINS for comparing strings (NOT to negate) example: customer starts martin and date <= 1/1/2006
Alert.SearchStart: Nothing found Do you want to continue from beginning?
Alert.DelRow: Are you sure to delete row '%d' ?
Alert.DelSelected: Are you sure to delete %d selected rows ?
Alert.PrintReady: Grid is ready to print Choose Print Preview option in menu to update page size Or choose Print option or press Ctrl+P to print directly
Alert.PrintCloseWindow: After print is finished, you can close this page
Alert.PrintCloseTag: After print is finished, you can click to the grid to return

Text.GroupCustom: To group by, drag column caption here ...
Text.Print: Please wait while generating report for printing ...
Text.Printed: Please switch to window containing the report to print it
Text.PDFFitPages: Real size,Shrink to width,Resize to width,Single page

Gantt.ErrGanttPercentEdit: Wrong input, the value must be in range 0 - 100
Gantt.NewGanttFlag: Add new flag to selected point
Gantt.GanttPercentEdit: Enter new completed status in percent
Gantt.GanttDepLagEdit: Enter the lag for the dependency
Gantt.GanttDepLagChange: Change lag of line to %d
Gantt.GanttResizeDelete: Are you sure to delete the item?
Gantt.GanttCorrectDependencies: There are also %d dependent tasks that should be updated. Do you want to move them?
Gantt.GanttCorrectDependency: There is also one dependent task that should be updated. Do you want to move it?
Gantt.GanttCorrectTask: The task violates its constraints, do you want to move it?
Gantt.GanttDeleteDependencies: There are %d dependencies, do you want to delete them?
Gantt.GanttCircularDependencies: It will cause circular dependency relation. Do you want to create it anyway?
Gantt.GanttCircularDependenciesErr: It is not possible to create circular dependency relation
Gantt.ErrComplete: The complete value must be in range 0 - 100!
Gantt.ErrEnd: The end date cannot be less than start date!
Gantt.ErrCorrect: It is not possible to correct the dependencies!
Gantt.ErrCorrectSome: Not all dependencies were corrected due constraints!
Gantt.GanttCheckExclude: The object starts on holiday, do you want to move it to the right?
Gantt.GanttMinStart: The task must start after %d
Gantt.GanttMaxStart: The task must start before %d
Gantt.GanttMinEnd: The task must finish after %d
Gantt.GanttMaxEnd: The task must finish before %d
Gantt.GanttDepLagChangeEnd: Change lag of line from %d
Gantt.GanttExactStart: The task must start on %d
Gantt.GanttExactEnd: The task must finish on %d
Gantt.NewGanttPoint: Add new point to selected point
Gantt.ErrStart: The start date cannot be higher than end date!
Gantt.GanttCheckExcludeBack: The object starts on holiday, do you want to move it to the left?
Gantt.ErrDateLow: The date cannot be before %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrDateHigh: The date cannot be after %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrDateHighEqual: The date cannot be after or exactly %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrValueLow: The value cannot be less than %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrValueHigh: The value cannot be higher than %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrValueHighEqual: The value cannot be equal or higher than %d due %d constraint
Gantt.ErrCorrectDep: Not all dependencies were corrected due errors!
Gantt.CompleteChanged: Value changed to be in range 0 - 100
Gantt.DurationChanged: Value changed to be not negative
Gantt.ErrMoveChildren: Cannot move the task due children constraints
Gantt.GanttCorrectExclude: The object starts or ends on holiday, do you want to correct it?

MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmpty: Copy selected row tree structures above
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyBelow: Copy selected row tree structures below
MenuCopy.CopySelectedChild: Copy selected rows as the first children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedTreeChild: Copy selected row trees as the first children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyChild: Copy selected row tree structures as the first children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedChildEnd: Copy selected rows as the last children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedTreeChildEnd: Copy selected row trees as the last children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyChildEnd: Copy selected row tree structures as the last children
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEnd: Copy selected rows to the end
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEndPage: Copy selected rows to the end of page
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEndGrid: Copy selected rows to the end of grid
MenuCopy.CopySelectedTreeEnd: Copy selected row trees to the end
MenuCopy.CopySelectedTreeEndPage: Copy selected row trees to the end of page
MenuCopy.CopySelectedTreeEndGrid: Copy selected row trees to the end of grid
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyEnd: Copy selected row tree structures to the end
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyEndPage: Copy selected row tree structures to the end of page
MenuCopy.CopySelectedEmptyEndGrid: Copy selected row tree structures to the end of grid
MenuCopy.AddChild: Add new empty row as the first child
MenuCopy.AddChildEnd: Add new empty row as the last child
MenuCopy.AddRowEnd: Add new empty row to the end
MenuCopy.AddRowEndPage: Add new empty row to the end of page
MenuCopy.AddRowEndGrid: Add new empty row to the end of grid

MenuCfg.Caption: TreeGrid settings
MenuCfg.CheckUpdates: Check for updates on server every
MenuCfg.GanttCorrectDependenciesFixed: Auto correct also the changed task
MenuCfg.GanttErrSlack: Minimal slack bound for error task
MenuCfg.GanttFinishProof: Can move objects after project finish
MenuCfg.GanttFinishPreferred: Project finish is preferred to constraints

Format.r: ddd MMM d HH:mm:ss UTCzzzzz yyyy
Format.R: ddd MMM d HH:mm:ss UTCzzzzz yyyy

Toolbar.ExportTip: Export grid data to your spreadsheet program
Toolbar.AddTip: Add new row or move or copy selected rows
Toolbar.AddChildTip: Add new child row or move or copy selected rows to actual cursor position
Toolbar.SortTip: Enable sorting and re-sort rows now
Toolbar.SortTip1: Disable sorting to change sort criteria faster
Toolbar.CalcTip: Enable calculations and re-calculate grid now
Toolbar.CalcTip1: Disable calculations to edit cell values faster
Toolbar.ColumnsTip: Displays menu to choose visible columns
Toolbar.SplitTip: Split spanned selected or focused cells
Toolbar.OutdentTip: Outdent, move focused row below its parent
Toolbar.IndentTip: Indent, move focused row as child of the row above

Header.PanelHeaderCopyTip: Add new row or move or copy selected rows
